attributes.action: To reduce Hounslow Manor's Food Waste.
attributes.additional_details:
We are running a campaign to help reduce the amount of food waste produced by Hounslow Manor.

Just simple things like allowing more food option flexibility when buying a school meal eg being able to get the meat option side with the vegetarian option; Recycling waste food and/or even using it in a compost for vegetation on site.

We would appreciate if you could just take the time to sign this petition in order to make a difference.

Thankyou.
